column4: I see that the default runlevel is 2 X is running. What is the non-X runlevel and how do I configure the system to use that instead? (Aside from init at the comand line)
there is no non-x runlevel. If you dotn want GDM to start disable the GDm service
ubuntu has gotten away from the runlevels sort of thinking that most other disrtos use.
use some of the various 'sysv' init tools to mange whats running .
